Description: Limestone ostracon containing practice text and some geometrical and spiral pattern.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.35, pl.28)
Hasitzka 1990 / Neue Texte und Dokumentation zum Koptisch-Unterricht (p.116)

Acquisition name: Purchased from: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
